last_comment:
« Truss, a partnership between Quebec-based Hexo and Molson Canadian, said consumers can expect their products on sale in the first half of 2020 »

Imagine investing in a company that lies about revenue, lies about release dates consistenly, prints shares every month, even has the audacy to print & dump on the only good news we got in a year.

I want to see this stock burn to the ground

CA6MEAXQ3OLFMCPKL676N3TTWI.body:
This stock needs 30M+ volume, a sht ton of buyers to do up 5-10%

Yet this stock only needs 1M volume to go down 5% 

Sellers have so much powers. This means there is no actual interest in this stock, just pump and dump creating a sht load of bagholders

GM6UVE2HUVWCDKCXZ7QVOWEYSA.body:
GOOD NEWS
The fool has a negative article out!

6N3ROZSM2AS5MFQXC3TYNJDQOU.body:
To all longs : remember that HEXO is trading at a lower price than it was in January. And in January, investors were facing the possibility of insolvency, and were doubting the companies ability to restructure and increase revenues.

6 months later, HEXO has 150-200 MIL cash on hand, 30 MIL Q3 revenue, in line to reach 100 MIL this year, I repeat that they have 150-200 MIL cash on hand, a bunch of products to be released, cut costs, improved efficiency, 100 MIL in inventory, and I can go on and on and on.

I would say « stay long and strong » ; but that would not be representative of what we have to do. All we have to do is wait for the SP to ‘exponentiate’ (sic)

IU7OMAQVTITWRFIYASJRLXTLTU.body: I’m in 2500 shares. Roll the dice

R7MWYAQIPNEFYCF6UIJEP2WH2E.body: It’s not about making money anymore. It’s about not loosing all of it. Folks, markets are on the verge of massive drop. Buyer beware. Lol

H27B5GFYXUCB76AT5BQMWT2CLY.body: Lol the bashers and shorts are out in full force, imagine thinking stocks will go up when literally every industry is being hammered by covid

4SUW6MVQU5FXQ4KXD7UKQNCU4Q.body:
HEXO has 650M in assets which include 150-200M in cash yet people are talking about selling this stock trading at 400M LOL 

Nice try shorts

I5ATVBUUDAEZ22MSHD4PXHC2PQ.body: whats the possibility in getting delisted ?

RYIGNW7ZLWRZ3ETEHXPL5N77TQ.body: PPS does not surprise me.  This is why I have not entered.  Buying over $1 PPS without reverse split.  I am so bullish I will definitely start buying at this price, at this time  No fear of missing out.  Much safer than at this price and related sentiment. Otherwise, where going to test the first level of support, 50 day MA.  I hope this can hold. If not, we are headed back to the breakout level of support.  We can only listen to the market.  Hard fought for gains wiped out by a stupid capital raise structure.  Talk about a self inflicted wound.  If HEXO is sitting on hoards of cash as seems to be stated by some posters here.  Why would HEXO make this boneheaded offering.  On the brink of delisting!  Look at the result!   Long/short/ whatever not smart for HEXO. It can not be more obvious.  Look at the chart, look at the timing of the offering, look at the result before your eyes.  Already getting perilously close to breaching the 50 day MA.  HEXO shareholders, your major victory will be avoiding delisting by reverse split.  This really would show strength. I know, the second that a reverse spit happens the adjusted PPS and market capitulation is exactly the same, as I am sure most of you do.  In reality, it rarely is good for longs and is sometimes great for those who are looking to enter and of course who are dollar cost averaging(deal still makes no sense for HEXO unless they needed the cash immediately).  I do not know about shorts.  No interest in this side of the game.

FVVZG4MXSBK7FK522RPLSNHG4Y.body: Waiting to go down again to .60 and buy

JRJMQ62WR6DRVL6WG2KC2R4KIE.body: I feel I'm on the titanic....

PGR6PRFQVFY4OPDEAFLFDVZANE.body: Nikola jumped $60 while this bs still stuck to 0.8-0.7

ZGHI2IW3WKZDFPIEJX4MADMNKA.body: Backing up the truck on the Jan 2022 $1 Calls...

E5QYFA53KCPRG5KWF7ZCTT5F6I.body: Stock market in general has a potential to drop more and more. I guess Cannabis stocks including HEXO are smart and safest to invest compare to other industries.

QX3FTBCPMHB4LCFUBRCVEFZ6TI.body: Do not be scared when you see it’s raining but remember there will be sunshine after this rain. Wait for this sunny day.

QYPWNUSGOY4A4H3THKQF2LYZNY.body: Will be .5 by end of the friday morning next welk most likey. psuhing for .35 by October. I no stock markets. I beentrade for 5 year now.

PHQZA3AJAOCMIHJQZQPOW76EIE.body: cannabis demand rose sharply on the first covid wave,short term pain for now until financials again, i just got back in

N5JBLHMDGKE2MI4CE7FVLNJBQE.body: Some comforting posts on here.... thanks for the reassurance, I'm down about 30% on my calls but not too worried. Big market here, no reason to bash the company or the CEO as I believe they are doing fine. Markets been taking a beating the last two weeks..
